item.name: Æther Shockwave
item.text: Choose one — Tap all Spirits; or tap all non-Spirit creatures.
item.flavorText: "The strain upon the veil between worlds began to show near the end of the Kami War. Strange happenings that neither side could control lashed out across Kamigawa." —Observations of the Kami War

item.name: Araba Mothrider
item.text: Flying Bushido 1 (When this blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
item.flavorText: "My finest creations are fashioned after the moths of Eiganjo. They fly higher, faster, and more gracefully than any of my own designs." —Noboru, master kitemaker

item.name: Celestial Kirin
item.text: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, destroy all permanents with that spell's converted mana cost.
item.flavorText: All bow at its visitation—some in awe, some in honor, some in fear.

item.name: Charge Across the Araba
item.text: Sweep — Return any number of Plains you control to their owner's hand. Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn for each Plains returned this way.

item.name: Cowed by Wisdom
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your hand.

item.name: Curtain of Light
item.text: Target attacking unblocked creature becomes blocked. Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "Paint gold upon the wind, Shape the wind into a shield, And vanish behind the brightness." —Snow-Fur, kitsune poet

item.name: Descendant of Kiyomaro
item.text: As long as you have more cards in hand than each opponent, Descendant of Kiyomaro gets +1/+2 and has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage, you gain 3 life."
item.flavorText: "The blood of Kiyomaro flows in my veins. He did not let Eiganjo fall and neither shall I."

item.name: Eiganjo Free-Riders
item.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, return a white creature you control to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "The air filled with dust and the sound of wingbeats. The mothriders had joined the fray." —Great Battles of Kamigawa

item.name: Enduring Ideal
item.text: Search your library for an enchantment card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability.)

item.name: Ghost-Lit Redeemer
item.text: {W}, {T}: You gain 2 life. Channel — {1}{W}, Discard Ghost-Lit Redeemer: You gain 4 life.

item.name: Hail of Arrows
item.text: Hail of Arrows deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target attacking creatures.
item.flavorText: "Do not let a single shaft loose until my word. And when I give that word, do not leave a single shaft in Eiganjo." —General Takeno

item.name: Hand of Honor
item.text: Protection from black Bushido 1 (When this blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
item.flavorText: "The sword is just a tool. It is the samurai's hand that brings it to life."

item.name: Inner-Chamber Guard
item.text: Bushido 2 (When this blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.)
item.flavorText: "It seems that each time I visit Lord Konda his guards are more on edge, perhaps even more eager for the war to reach them." —Masako the Humorless

item.name: Kataki, War's Wage
item.text: All artifacts have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay {1}."
item.flavorText: "Before the war, we prayed to Kataki to sharpen our swords and harden our armor. Without his blessing our weapons are all but useless against the kami hordes." —Kenzo the Hardhearted

item.name: Kitsune Bonesetter
item.text: {T}: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Activate this ability only if you have more cards in hand than each opponent.
item.flavorText: "He kept generations whole before the Kami War, and now he turns his century of wisdom to healing the latest casualties." —Eight-and-a-Half-Tails

item.name: Kitsune Dawnblade
item.text: Bushido 1 (When this blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) When Kitsune Dawnblade enters the battlefield, you may tap target creature.

item.name: Kitsune Loreweaver
item.text: {1}{W}: Kitsune Loreweaver gets +0/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
item.flavorText: "Know your history. The lessons of the past will shield you in times of doubt."

item.name: Kiyomaro, First to Stand
item.text: Kiyomaro, First to Stand's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. As long as you have four or more cards in hand, Kiyomaro has vigilance. Whenever Kiyomaro deals damage, if you have seven or more cards in hand, you gain 7 life.

item.name: Michiko Konda, Truth Seeker
item.text: Whenever a source an opponent controls deals damage to you, that player sacrifices a permanent.
item.flavorText: "Watch over my father. Tell him I'm safe, but I won't come home until I find out how to bring him back to his senses, and Kamigawa is again at peace." —Michiko Konda, last letter to General Takeno

item.name: Moonwing Moth
item.text: Flying {W}: Moonwing Moth gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Night wings sprinkled with dust Of a thousand soldiers dead And a thousand cities fallen." —Snow-Fur, kitsune poet

item.name: Nikko-Onna
item.text: When Nikko-Onna enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment. Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may return Nikko-Onna to its owner's hand.

item.name: Plow Through Reito
item.text: Sweep — Return any number of Plains you control to their owner's hand. Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each Plains returned this way.
item.flavorText: The paths of the kami crisscrossed Kamigawa like scars left by a maddened surgeon.

item.name: Presence of the Wise
item.text: You gain 2 life for each card in your hand.
item.flavorText: "Humbly I bow. Silently I wait. Deeply I listen."

item.name: Promise of Bunrei
item.text: When a creature you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, sacrifice Promise of Bunrei. If you do, put four 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "I am not afraid to die today nor afraid of what death will bring."

item.name: Pure Intentions
item.text: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard cards this turn, return those cards from your graveyard to your hand. Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Pure Intentions, return Pure Intentions from your graveyard to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

item.name: Reverence
item.text: Creatures with power 2 or less can't attack you.
item.flavorText: "Despite the massive forces that allied against him, Konda never once believed he would lose the Kami War." —Masako the Humorless

item.name: Rune-Tail, Kitsune Ascendant
item.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control.

item.name: Rune-Tail's Essence
item.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control.

item.name: Shinen of Stars' Light
item.text: First strike Channel — {1}{W}, Discard Shinen of Stars' Light: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

item.name: Spiritual Visit
item.text: Put a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token onto the battlefield. Splice onto Arcane {W} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

item.name: Torii Watchward
item.text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.) Soulshift 4 (When this is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 4 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

item.name: Cloudhoof Kirin
item.text: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put the top X cards of target player's library into his or her graveyard, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

item.name: Cut the Earthly Bond
item.text: Return target enchanted permanent to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "The more kami that passed through the veil that separated them from our world, the weaker that veil became, threatening to tear into tatters at the slightest pressure." —The History of Kamigawa

item.name: Descendant of Soramaro
item.text: {1}{U}: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of cards in your hand, then put them back in any order.
item.flavorText: "Soramaro speaks through me. Listen And I will tell the wisdom of the ancestors."

item.name: Dreamcatcher
item.text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may sacrifice Dreamcatcher. If you do, draw a card.
item.flavorText: "Be careful where your mind wanders. Even in the quietest moments, the kami are listening, and your thoughts give them shape." —Lady Azami

item.name: Erayo, Soratami Ascendant
item.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell for the first time in a turn, counter that spell.

item.name: Erayo's Essence
item.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell for the first time in a turn, counter that spell.

item.name: Eternal Dominion
item.text: Search target opponent's library for an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card. Put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability. You may choose a new target for the copy.)

item.name: Evermind
item.text: (Nonexistent mana costs can't be paid.) Draw a card. Evermind is blue. Splice onto Arcane {1}{U} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

item.name: Freed from the Real
item.text: Enchant creature {U}: Tap enchanted creature. {U}: Untap enchanted creature.
item.flavorText: When a strong mind moves, form and energy shift to heed it.

item.name: Ghost-Lit Warder
item.text: {3}{U}, {T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. Channel — {3}{U}, Discard Ghost-Lit Warder: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.

item.name: Ideas Unbound
item.text: Draw three cards. Discard three cards at the beginning of the next end step.
item.flavorText: The apprentice stared in puzzlement. "But Master, you finished writing those spells just yesterday. Don't you remember?" The jushi's heart froze.

item.name: Kaho, Minamo Historian
item.text: When Kaho, Minamo Historian enters the battlefield, search your library for up to three instant cards and exile them. Then shuffle your library. {X}, {T}: You may cast a card with converted mana cost X exiled with Kaho without paying its mana cost.

item.name: Kami of the Crescent Moon
item.text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.
item.flavorText: "He's a lot like me, that masterless little kami . . . unimpressed by grandeur and never at a loss for a trick." —Toshiro Umezawa

item.name: Kiri-Onna
item.text: When Kiri-Onna enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand. Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may return Kiri-Onna to its owner's hand.

item.name: Meishin, the Mind Cage
item.text: All creatures get -X/-0, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
item.flavorText: It's dangerous indeed to be lost in someone else's thoughts.

item.name: Minamo Scrollkeeper
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Your maximum hand size is increased by one.
item.flavorText: The scrollkeepers never stepped an inch away from the doors of the Great Library, not even when the ogres and their oni masters swept through Minamo.

item.name: Moonbow Illusionist
item.text: Flying {2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

item.name: Murmurs from Beyond
item.text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. An opponent chooses one of them. Put that card into your graveyard and the rest into your hand.
item.flavorText: Like pools of fog that hid treacherous rocks from sailors' eyes, so too were the hands of the kami.

item.name: Oboro Breezecaller
item.text: Flying {2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Untap target land.
item.flavorText: "I feel their unnatural influence in the weary, weeping land. Do they care nothing for the creatures who walk below their clouds?" —Eight-and-a-Half-Tails

item.name: Oboro Envoy
item.text: Flying {2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Target creature gets -X/-0 until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

item.name: Oppressive Will
item.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your hand.
item.flavorText: When Minamo was abandoned, its younger students found themselves thrust into a war beyond their skill with talents beyond their control.

item.name: Overwhelming Intellect
item.text: Counter target creature spell. Draw cards equal to that spell's converted mana cost.
item.flavorText: "My brain hurts."

item.name: Rushing-Tide Zubera
item.text: When Rushing-Tide Zubera is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, if 4 or more damage was dealt to it this turn, draw three cards.
item.flavorText: Cut off from the kakuriyo by the destruction of their honden, the zubera sought new ways to bring their secrets home.

item.name: Sakashima the Impostor
item.text: You may have Sakashima the Impostor enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except its name is still Sakashima the Impostor, it's still legendary, and it gains "{2}{U}{U}: Return Sakashima the Impostor to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step."

item.name: Secretkeeper
item.text: As long as you have more cards in hand than each opponent, Secretkeeper gets +2/+2 and has flying.
item.flavorText: It is all the things that humanity was not meant to know.

item.name: Shape Stealer
item.text: Whenever Shape Stealer blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, change Shape Stealer's power and toughness to that creature's power and toughness until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Stand back. I know just what to do." —Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker

item.name: Shifting Borders
item.text: Exchange control of two target lands. Splice onto Arcane {3}{U} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

item.name: Shinen of Flight's Wings
item.text: Flying Channel — {U}, Discard Shinen of Flight's Wings: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

item.name: Soramaro, First to Dream
item.text: Flying Soramaro, First to Dream's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. {4}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Draw a card.

item.name: Trusted Advisor
item.text: Your maximum hand size is increased by two. At the beginning of your upkeep, return a blue creature you control to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: Some of Minamo's students claimed he was as old as the knowledge he dispensed.

item.name: Twincast
item.text: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
item.flavorText: Sometimes you have to search for inspiration, and sometimes it's right there in front of you.

item.name: Akuta, Born of Ash
item.text: Haste At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have more cards in hand than each opponent, you may sacrifice a Swamp. If you do, return Akuta, Born of Ash from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.name: Choice of Damnations
item.text: Target opponent chooses a number. You may have that player lose that much life. If you don't, that player sacrifices all but that many permanents.
item.flavorText: "Life is a series of choices between bad and worse." —Toshiro Umezawa

item.name: Death Denied
item.text: Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: Takenuma was filled with a chorus of moans, shrieks, and wails. Some came from the living, some from the dying, and some, most horribly, from the dead.

item.name: Death of a Thousand Stings
item.text: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have more cards in hand than each opponent, you may return Death of a Thousand Stings from your graveyard to your hand.

item.name: Deathknell Kami
item.text: Flying {2}: Deathknell Kami gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step. Soulshift 1 (When this is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

item.name: Deathmask Nezumi
item.text: As long as you have seven or more cards in hand, Deathmask Nezumi gets +2/+1 and has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
item.flavorText: "We had him cornered, we did . . . and, well, you know what they say about rats." —Araba patrol survivor

item.name: Exile into Darkness
item.text: Target player sacrifices a creature with converted mana cost 3 or less. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have more cards in hand than each opponent, you may return Exile into Darkness from your graveyard to your hand.

item.name: Footsteps of the Goryo
item.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step.
item.flavorText: In the case of violent deaths, kami offered a chance for revenge if the deceased offered up its corpse as a host to the invading kami.

item.name: Ghost-Lit Stalker
item.text: {4}{B}, {T}: Target player discards two cards. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. Channel — {5}{B}{B}, Discard Ghost-Lit Stalker: Target player discards four cards. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

item.name: Gnat Miser
item.text: Each opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by one.
item.flavorText: Nezumi insect-shamans enjoyed solitary lives, which was fortunate since no other nezumi could stand to live within half a mile of their foul stench.

item.name: Hand of Cruelty
item.text: Protection from white Bushido 1 (When this blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
item.flavorText: "The sword is just a tool. It is the samurai's hand that delivers death."

item.name: Infernal Kirin
item.text: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, target player reveals his or her hand and discards all cards with that spell's converted mana cost.
item.flavorText: The kirin bellowed—an echoing, twisted parody of its once-inspirational call.

item.name: Kagemaro, First to Suffer
item.text: Kagemaro, First to Suffer's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. {B}, Sacrifice Kagemaro: All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

item.name: Kagemaro's Clutch
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -X/-X, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
item.flavorText: The mist was thick, cloying, and constricting. Shiro fought his way to fresh air only to look back and see his comrades fallen on the battlefield behind him.

item.name: Kami of Empty Graves
item.text: Soulshift 3 (When this is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

item.name: Kemuri-Onna
item.text: When Kemuri-Onna enters the battlefield, target player discards a card. Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may return Kemuri-Onna to its owner's hand.

item.name: Kiku's Shadow
item.text: Target creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.
item.flavorText: "Me? No, I'm not going to kill you. I won't even lay a finger on you. I promise." —Kiku, Night's Flower

item.name: Kuon, Ogre Ascendant
item.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature.

item.name: Kuon's Essence
item.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature.

item.name: Kuro's Taken
item.text: Bushido 1 (When this blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {1}{B}: Regenerate Kuro's Taken.
item.flavorText: Simple bargains are the most tempting, and oni bargains are the simplest of all: eternal life for eternal service.

item.name: Locust Miser
item.text: Each opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by two.
item.flavorText: "They're numerous, attack in swarms, and are always hungry. No wonder we rats hold such a kinship with them."

item.name: Maga, Traitor to Mortals
item.text: Maga, Traitor to Mortals enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. When Maga enters the battlefield, target player loses life equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it.

item.name: Measure of Wickedness
item.text: At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice Measure of Wickedness and you lose 8 life. Whenever another card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, target opponent gains control of Measure of Wickedness.

item.name: Neverending Torment
item.text: Search target player's library for X cards, where X is the number of cards in your hand, and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability. You may choose a new target for the copy.)

item.name: One with Nothing
item.text: Discard your hand.
item.flavorText: When nothing remains, everything is equally possible.

item.name: Pain's Reward
item.text: Each player may bid life. You start the bidding with a bid of any number. In turn order, each player may top the high bid. The bidding ends if the high bid stands. The high bidder loses life equal to the high bid and draws four cards.

item.name: Raving Oni-Slave
item.text: When Raving Oni-Slave enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, you lose 3 life if you don't control a Demon.

item.name: Razorjaw Oni
item.text: Black creatures can't block.
item.flavorText: It gnashed its teeth, and the battlefield filled with the screech of blade striking blade.

item.name: Shinen of Fear's Chill
item.text: Shinen of Fear's Chill can't block. Channel — {1}{B}, Discard Shinen of Fear's Chill: Target creature can't block this turn.

item.name: Sink into Takenuma
item.text: Sweep — Return any number of Swamps you control to their owner's hand. Target player discards a card for each Swamp returned this way.

item.name: Skull Collector
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, return a black creature you control to its owner's hand. {1}{B}: Regenerate Skull Collector.
item.flavorText: "Your blood I'll use. Your skull I'll keep."

item.name: Adamaro, First to Desire
item.text: Adamaro, First to Desire's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in the hand of the opponent with the most cards in hand.
item.flavorText: "Beware Adamaro In him all pain and anger is perfected." —Isao, Enlightened Bushi

item.name: Akki Drillmaster
item.text: {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "What part of ‘hayaku ikee' did you not understand?"

item.name: Akki Underling
item.text: As long as you have seven or more cards in hand, Akki Underling gets +2/+1 and has first strike.
item.flavorText: "I lost my hounds in the war and thus found myself employing akki as servants. I found their training to be remarkably similar." —Kensuke, houndmaster

item.name: Barrel Down Sokenzan
item.text: Sweep — Return any number of Mountains you control to their owner's hand. Barrel Down Sokenzan deals damage to target creature equal to twice the number of Mountains returned this way.

item.name: Burning-Eye Zubera
item.text: When Burning-Eye Zubera is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, if 4 or more damage was dealt to it this turn, Burning-Eye Zubera deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

item.name: Captive Flame
item.text: {R}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Kills and cooks your food in one easy stroke."

item.name: Feral Lightning
item.text: Put three 3/1 red Elemental creature tokens with haste onto the battlefield. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.
item.flavorText: They moved like apes, but a thousand times swifter, prying into every corner, leaving pawprints of ash.

item.name: Gaze of Adamaro
item.text: Gaze of Adamaro deals damage equal to the number of cards in target player's hand to that player.
item.flavorText: Wherever it looked, it saw destruction—the wake of its own gaze.

item.name: Ghost-Lit Raider
item.text: {2}{R}, {T}: Ghost-Lit Raider deals 2 damage to target creature. Channel — {3}{R}, Discard Ghost-Lit Raider: Ghost-Lit Raider deals 4 damage to target creature.

item.name: Glitterfang
item.text: Haste At the beginning of the end step, return Glitterfang to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "Through the veil's rip spilled hundreds of minor kami, rushing over the battlefield like embers from a kicked campfire. Then they were gone." —Great Battles of Kamigawa

item.name: Godo's Irregulars
item.text: {R}: Godo's Irregulars deals 1 damage to target creature blocking it.
item.flavorText: Godo trained their muscles and honed their skills, but he left their hearts wild and empty.

item.name: Hidetsugu's Second Rite
item.text: If target player has exactly 10 life, Hidetsugu's Second Rite deals 10 damage to that player.
item.flavorText: Hidetsugu never relinquished a grudge. He let it burn within him, gathering ever greater intensity until the final moment of vengeance.

item.name: Iizuka the Ruthless
item.text: Bushido 2 (When this blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.) {2}{R}, Sacrifice a Samurai: Samurai creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn.

item.name: Inner Fire
item.text: Add {R} to your mana pool for each card in your hand.
item.flavorText: "Heart of Sokenzan, I call to you Lend me your fire."

item.name: Into the Fray
item.text: Target creature attacks this turn if able. Splice onto Arcane {R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

item.name: Jiwari, the Earth Aflame
item.text: {X}{R}, {T}: Jiwari, the Earth Aflame deals X damage to target creature without flying. Channel — {X}{R}{R}{R}, Discard Jiwari: Jiwari deals X damage to each creature without flying.

item.name: Oni of Wild Places
item.text: Haste At the beginning of your upkeep, return a red creature you control to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: The oni leapt easily from peak to peak, toying with its victims, its voice a purr from the rumbling depths of nightmare.

item.name: Path of Anger's Flame
item.text: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Walking the path of the kami only leaves you with singed feet." —Soratami saying

item.name: Rally the Horde
item.text: Exile the top three cards of your library. If the last card exiled isn't a land, repeat this process until the last card exiled is a land. Put a 1/1 red Warrior creature token onto the battlefield for each nonland card exiled this way.

item.name: Ronin Cavekeeper
item.text: Bushido 2 (When this blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.)
item.flavorText: The akki were surprised to encounter a human who could fight in the caves as well as they.

item.name: Shinen of Fury's Fire
item.text: Haste Channel — {R}, Discard Shinen of Fury's Fire: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

item.name: Skyfire Kirin
item.text: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may gain control of target creature with that spell's converted mana cost until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Its fiery visitation burns away the fog of war and dissipates the ties of loyalty.

item.name: Sokenzan Renegade
item.text: Bushido 1 (When this blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player has more cards in hand than each other player, that player gains control of Sokenzan Renegade.

item.name: Sokenzan Spellblade
item.text: Bushido 1 (When this blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {1}{R}: Sokenzan Spellblade gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

item.name: Spiraling Embers
item.text: Spiraling Embers deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of cards in your hand.
item.flavorText: The akki knew to stay indoors on the days the oni flew their kites.

item.name: Sunder from Within
item.text: Destroy target artifact or land.
item.flavorText: Trapped for eons within the sacred gong, the kami boomed and clanged to a deafening tempo as they destroyed their erstwhile prison.

item.name: Thoughts of Ruin
item.text: Each player sacrifices a land for each card in your hand.
item.flavorText: "In our war with the kami, we annihilate what is our own. Do they too suffer ruination in their hidden world?" —Diary of Azusa

item.name: Undying Flames
item.text: Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card. Undying Flames deals damage to target creature or player equal to that card's converted mana cost. Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability. You may choose a new target for the copy.)

item.name: Yuki-Onna
item.text: When Yuki-Onna enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact. Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may return Yuki-Onna to its owner's hand.

item.name: Arashi, the Sky Asunder
item.text: {X}{G}, {T}: Arashi, the Sky Asunder deals X damage to target creature with flying. Channel — {X}{G}{G}, Discard Arashi: Arashi deals X damage to each creature with flying.

item.name: Ayumi, the Last Visitor
item.text: Legendary landwalk
item.flavorText: Before Shinka's walls were built, before the torii at Okina stood, she was there, tall and proud against the sky, and she will be there long after they have fallen into dust.

item.name: Bounteous Kirin
item.text: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may gain life equal to that spell's converted mana cost.
item.flavorText: Even the most benevolent and life-giving of kami joined the war against the mortal world, but only with heavy and sorrowful hearts.

item.name: Briarknit Kami
item.text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
item.flavorText: One thorn to warn, ten thorns to defend, a hundred thorns to destroy.

item.name: Dense Canopy
item.text: Creatures with flying can block only creatures with flying.
item.flavorText: The orochi learned how to move swiftly and surely along the forest floor, like fish darting through gull-watched waters.

item.name: Descendant of Masumaro
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Descendant of Masumaro for each card in your hand, then remove a +1/+1 counter from Descendant of Masumaro for each card in target opponent's hand.

item.name: Dosan's Oldest Chant
item.text: You gain 6 life. Draw a card.
item.flavorText: As Dosan's chant grew in volume, a second, deeper voice rose up in harmony behind it, strong enough to shake the earth and yet vibrant enough to fill the spirit.

item.name: Elder Pine of Jukai
item.text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. Soulshift 2 (When this is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

item.name: Endless Swarm
item.text: Put a 1/1 green Snake creature token onto the battlefield for each card in your hand. Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability.)

item.name: Fiddlehead Kami
item.text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, regenerate Fiddlehead Kami.
item.flavorText: "Like a riddle, it unwinds. Like a green wind, it reaches out. Like a sudden guilt, it seizes." —Snow Fur, kitsune poet

item.name: Ghost-Lit Nourisher
item.text: {2}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Channel — {3}{G}, Discard Ghost-Lit Nourisher: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

item.name: Haru-Onna
item.text: When Haru-Onna enters the battlefield, draw a card. Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may return Haru-Onna to its owner's hand.

item.name: Inner Calm, Outer Strength
item.text: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
item.flavorText: The ghostly objects around the kami circled faster and faster, creating a dizzying cyclone of motion. When it opened its eyes, it struck.

item.name: Kami of the Tended Garden
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Kami of the Tended Garden unless you pay {G}. Soulshift 3 (When this is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

item.name: Kashi-Tribe Elite
item.text: Legendary Snakes you control have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.) Whenever Kashi-Tribe Elite deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

item.name: Masumaro, First to Live
item.text: Masumaro, First to Live's power and toughness are each equal to twice the number of cards in your hand.
item.flavorText: "In the waning moments of war, humanity's most ancient ancestors return. But whose side shall they make their own?" —Isao, Enlightened Bushi

item.name: Matsu-Tribe Birdstalker
item.text: Whenever Matsu-Tribe Birdstalker deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. {G}: Matsu-Tribe Birdstalker gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)

item.name: Molting Skin
item.text: Return Molting Skin to its owner's hand: Regenerate target creature.
item.flavorText: "We have learned much from the orochi."

item.name: Nightsoil Kami
item.text: Soulshift 5 (When this is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 5 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

item.name: Okina Nightwatch
item.text: As long as you have more cards in hand than each opponent, Okina Nightwatch gets +3/+3.
item.flavorText: Only the most skilled budoka could protect the Okina Shrine. Only the best of these protectors took the night watch.

item.name: Promised Kannushi
item.text: Soulshift 7 (When this is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 7 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

item.name: Reki, the History of Kamigawa
item.text: Whenever you cast a legendary spell, draw a card.
item.flavorText: "After his death, monks spent ten years transcribing the tattoos from Reki's body and gathering stories from those who spoke with him. Thus the volume you hold was written." —The History of Kamigawa

item.name: Rending Vines
item.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment if its converted mana cost is less than or equal to the number of cards in your hand. Draw a card.

item.name: Sakura-Tribe Scout
item.text: {T}: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "Scouts of the Sakura Tribe spent two years wandering the forest to learn every leaf and tree. That knowledge was called upon during the Kami War to ensure the orochi's survival." —The History of Kamigawa

item.name: Sasaya, Orochi Ascendant
item.text: Whenever a land you control is tapped for mana, for each other land you control with the same name, add one mana to your mana pool of any type that land produced.

item.name: Sasaya's Essence
item.text: Whenever a land you control is tapped for mana, for each other land you control with the same name, add one mana to your mana pool of any type that land produced.

item.name: Seed the Land
item.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield, its controller puts a 1/1 green Snake creature token onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: With a sadness and a sense of hope, Senka left the colony of her birth and, with her attendants, set out to serve as broodmistress, founder of a new colony.

item.name: Seek the Horizon
item.text: Search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: "I've seen this great land from every angle. I know its every tree, stone, and river bend. Yet I have come to realize that knowing a thing is not the same as healing it." —Diary of Azusa

item.name: Sekki, Seasons' Guide
item.text: Sekki, Seasons' Guide enters the battlefield with eight +1/+1 counters on it. If damage would be dealt to Sekki, prevent that damage, remove that many +1/+1 counters from Sekki, and put that many 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens onto the battlefield. Sacrifice eight Spirits: Return Sekki from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.name: Shinen of Life's Roar
item.text: All creatures able to block Shinen of Life's Roar do so. Channel — {2}{G}{G}, Discard Shinen of Life's Roar: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.

item.name: Stampeding Serow
item.text: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, return a green creature you control to its owner's hand.

item.name: Iname as One
item.text: When Iname as One enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, you may search your library for a Spirit permanent card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. When Iname as One is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may exile it. If you do, return target Spirit permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.name: Ashes of the Fallen
item.text: As Ashes of the Fallen enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Each creature card in your graveyard has the chosen creature type in addition to its other types.
item.flavorText: The ashes of the dead mingle with the soil, and both become as one.

item.name: Blood Clock
item.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player returns a permanent he or she controls to its owner's hand unless he or she pays 2 life.
item.flavorText: In an age of war, time is measured not by sand but by blood.

item.name: Ebony Owl Netsuke
item.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has seven or more cards in hand, Ebony Owl Netsuke deals 4 damage to him or her.
item.flavorText: "Owls filled the skies during the Kami War, harbingers of darker times to come." —The History of Kamigawa

item.name: Ivory Crane Netsuke
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have seven or more cards in hand, you gain 4 life.
item.flavorText: It is said that the feathers of a crane are clouds, plucked and sewn together by the hands of the kami.

item.name: Manriki-Gusari
item.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+2 and has "{T}: Destroy target Equipment." Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.name: O-Naginata
item.text: O-Naginata can be attached only to a creature with 3 or more power. Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and has trample. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.name: Pithing Needle
item.text: As Pithing Needle enters the battlefield, name a card. Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

item.name: Scroll of Origins
item.text: {2}, {T}: Draw a card if you have seven or more cards in hand.
item.flavorText: The words from which language sprang, the knowledge from which thought was born, the story from which history was woven.

item.name: Soratami Cloud Chariot
item.text: {2}: Target creature you control gains flying until end of turn. {2}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by target creature you control this turn.

item.name: Wine of Blood and Iron
item.text: {4}: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power. Sacrifice Wine of Blood and Iron at the beginning of the next end step.
item.flavorText: Godo never revealed what went into his special brew, but he always had more of it after great victories.

item.name: Mikokoro, Center of the Sea
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}: Each player draws a card.
item.flavorText: "Center of the Sea, Eye of the World, Shrine of Enlightenment. Seek it for answers. Seek it for healing. Seek it and return transformed." —Scroll fragment from the ruins of Minamo

item.name: Miren, the Moaning Well
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.

item.name: Oboro, Palace in the Clouds
item.text: {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. {1}: Return Oboro, Palace in the Clouds to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: Here the soratami wove their endless plots—graceful, artful, and deceitful, while the unwitting world moved below.

item.name: Tomb of Urami
item.text: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. Tomb of Urami deals 1 damage to you if you don't control an Ogre. {2}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice all lands you control: Put a legendary 5/5 black Demon Spirit creature token with flying named Urami onto the battlefield.
